title: Galio's W and Windspeaker

replies.body:
The confusion is because you're only taking the first line of the ability without the context of the rest.
The "shield" is actually just an armor and mr buff, Windspeaker affects flat value shields.
The lolwiki entry for Bulwark actually never says "shield" at all, it just says "grants armor and magic resist", because that's all it does.

It will however affect the heal part of Bulwark.
this is true. perhaps they should rename galio's W to a "barrier" or "Galio PROTECTS an ally" so the confusion isnt there
